name: sst-operations-action
description: A unified GitHub Action for SST operations: deploy, diff, and remove

scripts.validate: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun test
scripts.quality:check: bun run quality:lint && bun run quality:format && bun run quality:typecheck && bun run quality:test-coverage && bun run quality:bundle-size
scripts.quality:bundle-size: bun run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const stats=fs.statSync('dist/index.cjs'); const sizeMB=stats.size/(1024*1024); console.log('Bundle size:', sizeMB.toFixed(2) + 'MB'); if(sizeMB>10) { console.error('Bundle size exceeds 10MB limit!'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✓ Bundle size within 10MB limit'); }"
scripts.quality:complexity: echo '✓ Code complexity analysis passed (placeholder for future tooling)'
scripts.quality:security: echo '✓ Security scan passed (placeholder for future tooling)'
scripts.quality:performance: echo '✓ Performance analysis passed (placeholder for future tooling)'
scripts.quality:all: bun run quality:check && bun run quality:complexity && bun run quality:security && bun run quality:performance

author: Your Organization
